Dialogue.0: "Aye, it be true! The beast were tall as the mast of my ship---no, taller still!"
Dialogue.1: You can't help but overhear the end of 'Enry's story as you walk in... although it seems like most of the bar is already listening in.
Dialogue.2: You drag over a chair and slump down in it, not even bothering to walk over to the bar and order something.
Dialogue.3: You don't know why you're so tired right now. I mean, the bar is pretty far away, all the way across the room... you'll do it later, you tell yourself.
Dialogue.4: "It rose up over the bow, and drew a great shadow cross the length of the horizon."
Dialogue.5: "Men around me quaked in fear. It felt like we had descended into the Abyss itself!"
Dialogue.7: Everyone leans in. **Even you, despite how tired you are.
Dialogue.8: 'Enry looks around at each of you in turn.
